sentences.en: 673 private golf clubs took part in a recent study.
sentences.cn: 673家私人高尔夫俱乐部参与了最近的研究。

sentences.en: Brilliant strategy on the part of Confederate forces ensured their victory at Chancellorsville.
sentences.cn: 盟军巧妙的战略确保了他们在钱瑟勒斯维尔的胜利

sentences.en: Could someone take the part of Romeo, please?
sentences.cn: 能请谁来扮演罗密欧吗？

sentences.en: engine parts
sentences.cn: 发动机部件

sentences.en: For my part, I feel elated and close to tears.
sentences.cn: 就我而言，我感到非常高兴，都快落泪了。

sentences.en: For part of the day, you will be outside doing practical work.
sentences.cn: 你们每天将有一部分时间在户外实际操作。

sentences.en: He was in large part a journalist and propagandist.
sentences.cn: 他很大程度上是个新闻记者和宣传者。

sentences.en: I for my part find the story less than convincing.
sentences.cn: 就我而言，我觉得这个报道毫无说服力。

sentences.en: If only he could conceal his part in the accident.
sentences.cn: 如果他能掩盖他在那次事故中有份参与就好了。

sentences.en: It is a part of Britain as yet largely unaccustomed to tourists.
sentences.cn: 英国的这一块地方还很不为游客所熟悉。

sentences.en: it's best to accept that some inconveniences are part and parcel of travel.
sentences.cn: 最好承认有些不便之处是旅行中不可避免的。

sentences.en: Katharine’s playing the part of Mary in the school play.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳在学校的话剧中扮演玛丽一角。

sentences.en: Lay all the parts out before you start assembling the model.
sentences.cn: 开始组装模型之前把所有的零件都摆放出来。

sentences.en: Mind trainers are now part of a tennis star's retinue.
sentences.cn: 现在，网球明星的随行人员中有些是心理培训师。

sentences.en: Ralph’s lips parted in a delighted smile.
sentences.cn: 拉尔夫咧嘴开心地笑了。

sentences.en: Roadside cafes are now a big part of the catering industry.
sentences.cn: 现在路边小餐馆构成了餐饮业很大一部分。

sentences.en: She had that inbred politeness, it was a part of her.
sentences.cn: 她拥有那种天生的优雅，举手投足都彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: She took part in a BBC radio phone-in programme.
sentences.cn: 她参加了英国广播公司听众来电参与节目。

sentences.en: Sixteen teams are taking part, divided into four groups.
sentences.cn: 有16个队参加，分为4组。

sentences.en: take a joke in good part.
sentences.cn: 善意地开玩笑

sentences.en: The crowd parted to let him through.
sentences.cn: 人群分开让他通过。

sentences.en: The trio are part of Sotheby's sale of Works of Art.
sentences.cn: 该三件套是苏富比艺术品拍卖会上的一件拍品。

sentences.en: The western-most part of north Wales is a stronghold of Welsh-speakers.
sentences.cn: 北威尔士最西部是说威尔士语人的聚居区。

sentences.en: The worst part of the set-up is the poor instruction manual.
sentences.cn: 安装时最糟糕就是操作指南讲述不够清楚。

sentences.en: there was a series of errors on my part.
sentences.cn: 我犯了一连串的错误。

sentences.en: These days work plays an important part in a single woman's life.
sentences.cn: 现在，工作在单身女性的生活中起着重要作用。

sentences.en: These various complaints are part of a continuum of ill-health.
sentences.cn: 这些各种各样的疾病、不适都是身体健康状况欠佳的一种表现。

sentences.en: they parted company outside the Red Lion.
sentences.cn: 他们在“红狮”外面分道扬镳。

sentences.en: This final part of the mixing is done slowly and delicately.
sentences.cn: 调和的最后一步要缓慢而精心。

sentences.en: When he parted the curtains, the sunlight flooded into the room.
sentences.cn: 他拉开窗帘，阳光洒进屋内。

sentences.en: Working overtime is part and parcel of his job.
sentences.cn: 超时工作是他工作的基本特征

words.tran_cn: 局部的；偏爱的；不公平的
划分，分开；[数] 分割；隔墙；隔离物
分开（part的过去式及过去分词）
划分（partition的过去分词）；分割；把…分成部分

phrases.tran_cn: 多面手，有各种才能的人
积极的作用；能动部分，主动部分
是…的本质特征（或要素)，是…的基本部分
中心部位；中央控制元件

phrases.phrase: for my (或 his, her，等) part

phrases.tran_cn: 多半，通常：很大程度地；普遍地或大部分地
脾性好地：性情好地或风度优雅地；不发火地
部分地：在某种程度上；部分地
积分部分；整数部份；主要的部分
看上去像模像样，看起来样子像那种人
主要部分，主体；主要零件
就…而言：关于或就某一特定的人而言

phrases.phrase: on the part of (或 on my, their，等 part)

phrases.tran_cn: 重要部分：基本的或不可缺少的部分
放弃：放弃或使离开；弃权
（在争执中）支持并鼓励（某人)，袒护（某人）

trans.tran_en: payment of only a part of something, not all of it

trans.tran_cn: 部分，零件，角色，成员，部位，区域，集，参与，声部，等份，分缝
trans.tran_en: a piece or feature of something such as an object, area, event, or period of time
a piece or feature of something such as an object, area, event, or period of time
the words and actions of a particular character in a play or film

trans.tran_cn: 离开，分离，解散，梳成分头
trans.tran_en: to move the two sides of something apart, or to move apart, making a space in the middle
